title: Bug 50857Test failures on Windows 7, 24 thread system
description: Bug 50857Test failures on Windows 7, 24 thread system testPoolThreads20Connections10FairAsync[junit] java.sql.SQLException: [tomcatpool10] NoWait: Pool empty. Unable to fetch a connection, none available[10 in use].
